description:
BRIO World - Railway is a cozy and creative sandbox experience where you can build your very own train city. Using an easy-to-use building system, you’ll lay tracks, place scenery, and design detailed railway systems that come to life before your eyes. Whether you're a longtime train fan or just looking for a peaceful game to unwind with, this is your perfect escape.

Bring your imagination to life with over 250 beautifully crafted pieces - including tracks, trees, bridges, buildings, animals, and more. All pieces are designed with the classic BRIO wooden toy aesthetic, highlighting the warmth and charm of handcrafted playsets.

Meet the charming characters who live in your world and help them with fun little tasks. Complete missions to level up and unlock new parts and features as you go.

Drive your trains or cars in an immersive first-person view and see your creations from a whole new perspective, or simply sit back and watch your trains drive along the tracks you’ve laid down. It’s your world - explore it however you like.

BRIO World - Railway is designed to be a gentle, no-stress experience that welcomes everyone. Whether you want to build for hours, play short creative sessions, or just enjoy watching your trains go by, it’s the perfect way to slow down and enjoy a moment of calm.
